name: git-branch-tube
description: A bash script to generate a git repo with lots of commits, branches and merges.

scripts.show: cd repository && git log --graph --abbrev-commit --decorate --format=format:'%C(bold blue)%h%C(reset) - %C(white)%s%C(reset) %C(dim white)- %an%C(reset)%C(bold yellow)%d%C(reset)' --all && cd -

author: Michael Nowack <syranez@minaga-church.de> (https://github.com/syranez)
